articles.title: India procures 16 Upgraded Super Rapid Naval Gun Systems for Indian Navy - Naval News
articles.description: The Indian Ministry of Defence has signed a contract with BHEL for procurement of 16 Upgraded Super Rapid naval gun systems.

Indian MoD press release

articles.title: Home prices at Gujarat’s GIFT City up by 30% in 18 months, to double in five years: Experts - The Indian Express
articles.description: Ahmedabad-based Shivalik Group, which has sold 80 per cent of its residential projects in GIFT City, says it is currently selling homes at Rs 7,500 per square feet.
